Poem for an Unspoiled Lesione
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Poetry: Poem for an Unspoiled Lesione
By The ShaMan on Thursday, December 18, 2003 - 12:02 pm:

Lesione,the living song,
Of gentleness and grace.
You lighten up your trainer's day
With your shining face.

Lesione,the living song,
As free as free can be.
How sweet that it must feel
To swim unhindered through the sea.

Lesione,the living song,
The embodiment of peace.
I hope and pray that
Your kind spirit will never,ever cease.

By Icelord13 on Wednesday, December 31, 2003 - 09:41 am:

Wow. I really like this poem. Your rhyme scheme has no flaws, and the poem is very original and creative.

By The ShaMan on Tuesday, January 13, 2004 - 12:08 pm:

thanx there ice lord but i think that there is a flaw in the last two lines.I dont think that i rhymed it very well.

By Icelord13 on Tuesday, January 13, 2004 - 03:33 pm:

well, ya. heres a good last two lines you could use.

I hope and pray that for all time,
your spirit will never cease.

It's all about choosing the right words. :)

By Icelord13 on Tuesday, January 13, 2004 - 03:34 pm:

your spirit shall never cease.
